name: 100: Hack the System
overview: 100: Hack the System (also known as Hack the System) is an education math game with puzzle elements similar in some ways to Mastermind, but with addition. You complete against the AI. The goal is to be the first to reach a sum of 100, hence the name of the game. The game was developed by B. Spartalis and published in PIXEL Junior #2 (01/1988).
